title: Advent launches Bluetooth Speaker with ETA certification from WPC
text: Advent launches Bluetooth Speaker with ETA certification from WPC Priyanka Singh Priyanka Singh ,TNN | Sep 11, 2015, 09.09 PM IST READ MORE Adit Infratel Pvt Ltd RELATED LUCKNOW: Advent, the flagship brand of Adit Infratel Pvt Ltd and a leading brand in the mobile accessories and peripherals market has launched its maiden Bluetooth speaker, ET -01 BUTF in India. Company claims the new speaker also carries the distinction of being one of first speakers in India with ETA certification from the WPC. Portable and light weight, the Advent ET-01 BUTF easily pairs with any Bluetooth device and offers a wide coverage of up to 8-10 metres. Company said that the speaker delivers superior audio quality in its segment and comes with rechargeable lithium battery that can last up to 4 hours. "The inbuilt microphone allows one to make hands free calls. The speaker supports a Micro SD slot of up to 32 GB and features both card and aux playability", added the company. Commenting on the launch, Vikram Kalia, Director Sales and Marketing, Adit Infratel said, 'At Adit Infratel, we have been in the mobility business for more than two decades and understand market trends and customer needs deeply. The brand Advent is an extension of these deep insights and embodies our commitment to quality, trust and customer centric innovations. Our maiden Bluetooth speaker has been re-designed keeping in mind the needs of the new age, on the move customer. The ET input source connectivity announcement will be something new in this segment." With funky and portable design, superior audio quality, long lasting battery and an affordable price tag, we truly believe the Advent ET -01 UTF will certainly appeal to our customers, he added. At an affordable pricing, the product comes with a warranty of 12 months. will be available at all leading retail outlets of all formats. It is also available on all leading e-commerce sites including Flipkart, Snapdeal, Amazon, Paytm, E-bay and Shopclues.com among others by the brand name 'Muven'. Established in the year 1992 and based in Gurgaon, the company is one of the largest manufacturers of OEM mobile batteries for leading companies in India including the country's largest handset marketing company Micromax.
